item.title: Sight Unseen
item.description:
“An online magazine that uncovers what’s new and next in design and the visual arts, with a focus on independent makers working outside traditional disciplinary boundaries.”
By Monica Khemsurov, Jill Singer, et al.
🇺🇸 Started in 2009.
Average 86 words.

item.title: Film and Furniture
item.description:
“Furniture & decor with a story to tell. Find interiors inspiration and buy decor from your favourite films. Best Design Inspiration Blog '19.”
By Paula Benson, et al.
